youtube:
Ukuthola imininingwane yakho ye-RTMP ye-YouTube, ngena ku-akhawunti yakho ye-YouTube bese uzulazula kokuthi CREATE > Yiba bukhoma. Uzobona isikrini esilandelayo:
{{youtubeLive}}
.Kopisha "I-URL yokusakaza" bese uyifake endaweni ethi "Namathisela i-RTMP URL lapha". Okulandelayo, kopisha "ukhiye wokusakaza" bese uwunamathisele enkambini "yokhiye wokusakaza". Chofoza okuthi "Iya Bukhoma" ukuze uqale ukusakaza bukhoma.
{{rtmpLive}}
facebook:
Ungasakaza kuphrofayela yakho nge-RTMP usuka ekhasini elithi Dala Bukhoma le-Facebook (nokuchofoza okuthi Dala Ukusakaza bukhoma) noma ngokuchofoza inkinobho ebukhoma endaweni ethi Dala ikhasi noma iphrofayela ofisa ukusakaza bukhoma kuyo. Uzolethwa kumdidiyeli obukhoma we-Facebook.
Skrolela phansi ngezansi kwesidlali sokubuka kuqala. Qiniseka ukuthi ngaphansi kokuthi "Qalisa" ukuthi imenyu yokudonsela phansi isethwe ukuze Sebenzisa Okhiye Bokusakaza. Uzothola i-URL ye-RTMP kanye Nokhiye Wokusakaza wale ndawo. (Qaphela: Ukubuka kuqala kwevidiyo yakho kusabonakala ekhoneni elingezansi kwesokudla.) {{facebookLive}} Kopisha i-"URL Yeseva" bese uyifake endaweni ethi "Namathisela i-RTMP URL lapha". Okulandelayo, kopisha "ukhiye wokusakaza" bese uwunamathisele enkambini "yokhiye wokusakaza". Chofoza okuthi "Iba bukhoma" ukuze uqale ukusakaza bukhoma.
{{rtmpLive}}
